summary: This module provides an extensive suite of unit tests that verify the structural parsing and interpretation of QASM2 files within Qiskit, covering barriers, custom classical and quantum instructions, gate applications and definitions, includes, measurements, registers, resets, version handling, whitespace handling, and strict parsing modes.
business_intent: Ensure the QASM2 parser reliably supports all language constructs and edge cases, guaranteeing accurate circuit construction and compatibility for quantum software developers.
